laboratory_examinations.findings: Gallbladder abnormality with wall thickening, irregular and likely perforated along the posterior margin with adjacent fat stranding. No gas or calcification seen in the gallbladder wall. A dominant fluid collection seen along the inferior edge of the liver measuring approximately 5.5 x 2.0 cm. Mild atelectatic change in lung bases. Right lower lobe 6-mm nodular opacity. Liver is otherwise unremarkable.
